website_summaries.verdict: Its premium ingredients and gel-to-milk transformation gives this cleaner plenty of appeal.
pros: Contains no dyes, parabens, or synthetic fragrances
cons: May leave a little residue after an application

customer_reviews.title: Want to give it 5 stars so badly! The dispenser is holding me back!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It leaves my skin feeling soft instead of dry after cleaning. I can’t give it 5 stars simply because of the packaging. It is VERY difficult to get the product out of the tube when it gets close to the bottom. If it wasn’t so expensive I wouldn’t care, but at almost $15 a tube I can’t afford to waste it. Honest Beauty- come up with a more user friendly dispenser!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed.... left a slight residue on my face . Also do not get in your eyes as instructed. How can it be a makeup remover, cleanser if it leaves doesn’t rinse clean and cannot get near eyes.
customer_reviews.author: djw62

customer_reviews.title: Oil residue feeling
customer_reviews.text: The product does do what it says starts as a gel then goes to a milk like liquid. It does seem to clean effectively. The only thing is when you rinse it it leaves a oil type feeling on your face. I kept trying to rinse it off , but that’s what it does. Not quite sure how I feel about that. I will use it a few weeks a see how I feel about it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Pim

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 1 star however i have to give Honest kudos for being a great company and having truly honest clean products but this is just not the face wash for me. It leaves your skin with a film that i end up having to rub off with my rw toner from burtsbee and a cotton round. Il keep it but it’s jot my favorite. The Gel like moisturizer is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I got this on Prime day & thought I would love it because I'm currently a little obsessed with "milk" skincare. This is alright as a cleanser, but I haven't seen it go from gel to milk. I've used a little. I've used more than I needed. I've used my fingers, a wet cotton ball & my face massager to apply it, but nothing works. For/on me, it doesn't go milky or even lather up. I'll use it up, but definitely never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Adele S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t like the feel of residue on your skin, meaning you want squeaky clean feeling, don’t buy this. I am impressed. It does leave a nice soft residue on my skin , probably from the glycerin. I have dry skin, live in a dry climate and want a product that leaves a soft feeling on my skin. I’m impressed. The residue on my skin isn’t heavy or oily. Just soft and nice. I’ll continue to buy as long as it’s available.
customer_reviews.author: trpsmom

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking for an alternative to cleansing balms because oil cleansing tends to break me out. But when I read the back one of the first ingredients...is coconut oil! Now if you have acne prone skin you KNOW how clogging coconut oil is. So I really dodged a bullet by reading before trying, but next time i'll try reading for buying.
customer_reviews.author: QueenN

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product feels very gentle and hydrating, perfect for my sensitive acne prone skin. There is no tight skin feeling you get with harsh soaps, and after a just a few days using it morning and night my skin feels slightly softer/plumper.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL CLEANSER
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write reviews. Yet, I find that here I am to tell you that this is a HOLY GRAIL cleanser. It washes away every particle of makeup and sunblock (when you massage onto dry skin first!!) and NEVER makes my skin feel stripped of moisture. In fact, I feel like this product imparts a layer of moisture to my skin that is NOT like a “residue;” just a clean layer of protection. Difficult to describe, but WORTH A TRY. I promise. The value of this innovative cleanser for this price point is outstanding. I hope this product is never discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Face Wash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this face wash for approximately 2-3 weeks. It is very gentle on the skin and does not break my very dry, acne prone skin out. It feels heavenly when being rubbed on my face and does not leave a residue on my skin. It has no scent at all which is nice because then I know that there isn't hidden chemicals in the word fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Whittney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great gel cleanser to take of makeup on dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how it takes off makeup on dry skin & then was off with a wash cloth is great. Only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars for value for money is that you do have to use a few squirts to get your makeup off & bottle does not contain that much product. But compared to other gel cleanser could say reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: g00d_dealz

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser feels so good on my face, doesn't dry out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Revonda Payne

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in hopes of finding an effective cleanser to assist with makeup removal and boy was I disappointed. This product does basically nothing besides leave an oily residue on your face that is very difficult to get off. My face remains oily for hours after use. It just smears you’re makeup around (especially mascara) and when you go to rinse it off, everything just sticks to your face due to the texture of this cleanser. I finally threw the tube away after giving it three chances all ending in frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Granted I am not a make-up user so I don't have to worry about that while using it... Otherwise it is very gentle with basically no scent, and yes there is an "oily" feeling to it on your face while using but as soon as you dry your skin after washing you cannot feel it anymore and your skin is silky smooth. I love this cleanser and the way it subtly goes from gel to a milky foam, it's just nice to use. Will definitely buy again. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: jdale

customer_reviews.title: Broken container, but salvaged some product.
customer_reviews.text: I just discovered Honest Beauty and I'm happy with their products. I just received the cleaner. Sad to say the top was busted and a lot of product spilled out of the top. I managed to tape the container closed. I hope this can persevere the product. I used some of the spilled product :). But was not able to salvage the rest. I'll let you know how it's working for me in a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple no scrub face cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is good for skin that doesn’t need much help. I use it first to remove my makeup and then use my face scrub to exfoliate. At my age of 40 I need more exfoliating.
customer_reviews.author: Shalimar  Sonnier

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so it’s really nice and smooth on the face and it definitely removed all of my makeup including my waterproof mascara! I’m not a huge fan of the smell. It doesn’t smell bad but it’s not my favorite. Overall good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: This cleanser is EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: I currently use Glamglow Galacticleanse hydrating jelly balm cleanser. I find this to be very similar except for the price ($32 vs $13). I’m very grateful for the savings.
customer_reviews.author: Terry107

customer_reviews.title: Not what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based off the marketing and didn't bother reading the reviews. First they skimp you on the amount in the bottle. I emailed customer service and they said that was normal and that they hadn't noticed it. I used it for the first time today and it doesn't lather like you would expect (hardly at all). Also I got some in my eye and its been burning for an hour. Will try something else when this bottle is through.
customer_reviews.author: Philip K Dick

customer_reviews.title: Good makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It leaves my skin moisturized ( I have dry skin) I’m also lazy when I remove my makeup so I like a product that washes away most my makeup rather than using wipes and so this melts away all of it very efficiently. Keep your eyes closed though so it doesn’t sting your eyes ( it does sometimes ). It’s really nice on my skin buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Ashour

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: This product wasn't bad, but it wasn't great either. Didn't do much for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria DeLeonibus

customer_reviews.title: Best Make up remover
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this fave wash to everyone! I can only use waterproof mascara or my eyelashes won’t curl and this makes it so easy to remove my makeup and I have very sensitive skin. I really love all the Honest products
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Removes makeup easily without irritation
customer_reviews.text: This is the first milk cream cleanser I’ve tried so I can’t compare product performance against other less expensive brands. Bought it because of Honest brand due to my eczema on my lips and eyes. Great product! Removes makeup easily without residue or irritation. I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Love the Honest Products, just not this cleanser
customer_reviews.text: It looked like it was taking off my makeup, but you need alot of it, then when you rinse it off it leaves a residue on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your face clean and hydrated
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it says it is.. magic! The gel gently purifies your skin as it turns into oil you can feel the hydration gently removing exes impurities.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Worst cleanser I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst cleanser I’ve ever used. Doesn’t clean off any makeup and leaves a residue on the face. Gave mine away. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Micaela Malmi

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t notice a difference between this cleanser and others but it’s decent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Jessica Alba was right
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for removing makeup, all natural, didn’t burn my eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good cleanser and does not remove makeup
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would use with silicon applicator!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves face feeling moisturized, love the slight rose scent! Been working well with skin so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I loved honest cleanser. It’s definitely worth it for me
customer_reviews.author: Baigali

customer_reviews.title: My skin doesn't feel clean
customer_reviews.text: I have used the gel cleanser previously and thought let me try this one. But I am not impressed. The gel is too thick and I feel it leaves a residue on my skin after I rinse thoroughly. I guess it is for dry skin to moisturize at the same time but I much prefer the gel cleanser that foams and I feel my skin is really clean after. I also prefer the scent of the gel cleanser. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Luise B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is a great all-purpose cleanser. As stated in the instructions and in Jessica's videos, first you rub the gel onto your DRY skin to dissolve any makeup. It is like magic for this! Then wet your fingers and rub it around to turn the gel into a milky light lather. I then use the Honest Beauty konjac sponge to gently wipe off most of the product and lightly exfoliate, followed by a rinse and pat dry with a towel. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean well
customer_reviews.text: Haven't found a face wash that I am not allergic to in years, so that's the upside. The downside is that it doesn't actually clean and just smears your make up around at best. Even when you wash multiple times. Leaves a nasty film on your skin that does not feel clean at all. Back to good old bar soap for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Knockout

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, but won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the company and appreciate the ingredients but this isn’t my favorite. It leaves a residue which some could probably consider moisturizing if you had dry skin but I don’t care for it. Smells like a mud mask.
customer_reviews.author: gkat831

customer_reviews.title: Two Washes Required
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Definitely follow the directions on how to remove makeup. It took me two washes to finally remove all of the makeup . I suggest applying on dry skin and rinsing with warm water, to remove make up entirely. So fresh !
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I love honest. I have a subscription to them but I didn't need anything this month so it was nice to get their product in just two days without having to purchase a whole bundle.
customer_reviews.author: leahrb

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Of all the honest products this is my least favorite but it still OK Otherwise I love everything else that I’ve purchased from them
customer_reviews.author: tealover

customer_reviews.title: Nice Find
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and gentle on the skin. My tween daughter is using for her sensitive skin. She wears a lot of sunscreen on the tennis courts daily. This is gentle but cleansing with no dryness,tightness or itchy feelings.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I know it doesent have bad ingredients and that is vegan ....but it smells disgusting it leaves this metal smell and taste.I dont know if it is expired or what?!But it is horible to the point i can not use it.Waste of money. will ask for refund
customer_reviews.author: Sanja

customer_reviews.title: High hopes crushed
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a great cleanser because of the hype and natural ingredients. Was also excited about the size for travel. Sadly it didn't do anything it said it would - no foaming with water and more importantly no effective cleansing. Returning...
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product but it doesn’t clean my skin. I feel like a thin layer of “milk” stays on my skin on top of the makeup it didn’t remove.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great For Cleansing, But SO Drying
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface this by saying that I LOVE Honest Beauty products (at least the heaping handful that I've tried so far) so I was excited to try this, but unfortunately I was left disappointed. It definitely takes makeup off well and makes my skin feel clean, but unfortunately it has also dried out my skin in places it doesn't normally dry out so I've had to stop using. :( Definitely didn't expect that, but it could be just my skin (dry/combination).
customer_reviews.author: USNPianoButterfly

customer_reviews.title: Don't skimp on your facial routine
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative to the VERY expensive Eight Saint Down to Earth Cleanser.....this is not it. I do like the gel consistency when you first dispense the product however I dont understand the turning to milk part...whats the point? And I absolutely agree with other reviews, it does leave a slightly oily residue on your skin but nothing that has been problematic to my combination skin. In conclusion, if you find a product you love just spend the money, you'll spend alot of time and money trying to find a cheaper alternative and its just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: It breaks up the make up really easy even the mascara, I love it, it’s creamy but when you rinse with water it dissolve fast. I just need to use a towel to pat dry my skin. No more disposable cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Cecy

customer_reviews.title: Non irritating face wash
customer_reviews.text: It is a very gentle wash for your face with it actually washing your face .
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you have a naturally Rosie face
customer_reviews.text: It is SO moisturizing and I have super dry skin! I was amazed because when I washed it off with warm water it did NOT make my sensitive skin red at all! I was so happy with it. I am looking forward to ordering this again. I’m hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Not so great at makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because it doesn't remove makeup as I thought I would. Really nice smell tho.
customer_reviews.author: MARIANGELA CS

customer_reviews.title: A nice cleanser but not a good match for my skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice gentle cleanser that moisturizes but it isn't a good match for my skin. I have oily/combination skin and I thought the pink clay would be good for absorbing oil and drawing out impurities. But it is very creamy and moisturizing - which isn't the right type of cleanser for my skin. I prefer a deeper clean. If you have dry, sensitive, or normal/balanced skin, this might be a good cleanser for you. For me, it didn't clean deeply enough and it provided more moisturizing than my skin needs.
customer_reviews.author: mhp

customer_reviews.title: I Am Liking the Honest Line More and More
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few of the Honest products of late, and have liked everything I've tried. This is a nice straightforward cleanser. I use it at night, followed by toner, serum and night creme. It washes away any traces of makeup that might be left along with whatever Los Angeles has deposited on my skin during the day. It is gentle. It does not irritate my skin It doesn't leave it feeling tight and over-dried. I like that is doesn't make a big foamy mess. (My plumbing appreciates that, too) I like that it is paraben, phthalate, fragrance and dye-free. I like that it is not tested on animals. I just plain like it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Burian-Mohr

customer_reviews.title: My Lady Loves This Product
customer_reviews.text: My lady has fallen in love with many products from the Honest Company, this gel-to-milk cleanser included. When I asked her for feedback about the product, she gushed about its effectiveness, and compared it favorably to other makeup-removing cleansers she used in the past. She reported no adverse reactions to the product, while praising the creamy and appealing consistency of the gel after it becomes wet. She stated the product completely removes makeup without any scrubbing or hard wiping, and afterwards leaves her face very soft and fresh. My lady highly recommends this cleanser, and plans to make it an everyday, go-to product.
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice fresh, natural scent, cleans without drying
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle 2-in-1 makeup remover and cleanser. It removed BB cream, blush, lipstick and regular mascara. I rarely use waterproof mascara and don't currently have any in my vanity so I don't know if this removes waterproof products. The cleanser has a nice fresh scent and light gel texture but doesn't make a thick lather (if that's your thing) but cleans without making skin feel dry or tight.
customer_reviews.author: knitting ninja

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do much for me
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind this is just one person's experience. This cleanser did not do much for me. It does have a cool effect of turning into a milky thin foam, but pretty much all soapy things do that. The proof was in the effectiveness, though -- or rather, lack thereof. When I finished rinsing off my face, it did not feel clean and bright, it felt like I had a thin layer of something on it. I wound up washing it again with something else to get it off. I don't like leaving negative reviews, so I very much hope that other people have a different experience.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great on Your Skin
customer_reviews.text: This Honest Beauty Magic Gel to Milk Cleanser feels great on my skin. It gets makeup off easily without leaving a greasy residue and I like its subtle scent and gentle formula. It lathers up well and rinses off well. The tube isn't that big but it will last a long time because you don't need a lot to wash your face (for me it's only a few dabs). The best thing is that the formulation has fewer artificial and toxic chemicals more commonly found in mass produced cleansers. Overall a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: VIDFAN

customer_reviews.title: Lovely cleanser, removes makeup easily.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely cleanser. The Gel-to-milk texture is very nice and it is very efficient at removing makeup without having to scrub sensitive skin. Using it with a soft silicone "brush" makes it even more efficient and easy to cover all areas. It rinses clean and leaves the face feeling soft and dewy.
customer_reviews.author: andiesenji

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cleanser. The scent isn’t the best but that’s because it’s vegan and it also doesn’t use a lot of the fragrances that most cleansers use to make them smell better because a lot fragrances can irritate your skin. It’s also a “gel to milk” cleanser so it’s not supposed to foam up. It turns into a milk consistency. Other than the scent, I love using this cleanser. It’s not drying and leaves my skin clean.
customer_reviews.author: madi trogdlon

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely!
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser works best with a cleansing tool, as it won't really get into pores and clean them without some help, but with a brush it works great to clean and leave your skin feeling very moisturized, and also you can really smell the rosewater so it's very nicely fragranced. It turns white fairly quickly after you apply it, and doesn't give you that squeaky clean feel but does work best for moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Moore

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works and Nonirritating!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this working. Most “clean” beauty products have been really horrible for me. They either irritated my skin and left it burning or they did nothing. This actually cleans! My skin feels great and my makeup is gone. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Schatzegal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do a great job removing makeup
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, sensitive skin and I’ve been looking for a good cleanser. It leaves an oily residue after using which I don’t mind but doesn’t do a good job of removing all my make up. I had the same problem with Cerave hydrating facial cleanser but atleast that one was cheap. I bought from target not Amazon though.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how smooth it made my skin feel. I'm still testing it since my skin is sensitive but so far I am LOVING it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser, i have it on auto ship. Rub it on dry, removes all makeup including waterproof without irritating the skin from too much rubbing. I used to use a $50 oil cleanser, but this is a fraction of the price and works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: DJL75

customer_reviews.title: residue left behind, but gel is nice
customer_reviews.text: The great thing about this is that the gel is thick enough that it doesn't go running down your face when you put it on. You can dot a bit on your forehead, nose, and both cheeks, and it doesn't move until you start to swish it around with your fingers. Honest company also makes very clean products that are very nice on sensitive skin. The only problem with this is that it leaves behind an oily feeling. I feel like I have to wash my face again, right after using this to wash my face.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Burns
customer_reviews.text: This is interesting. It dispenses like a gel and then turns into a creamy lather. It doesn't really rinse well off of the face and you're left with a thick layer of lotion on your skin. Good if you like that. I don't. It also burned the whole time it was on my face and for about an hour afterwards. It has a nice rose scent, but I'm not a fan of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hunting Creek

customer_reviews.title: Rosy kisses
customer_reviews.text: Lightly fragranced with a silky texture and milky metamorphosis, this face wash is perfect for sensitive skin. My skin felt cleansed and fresh without any harsh chemicals, though I did wish there was more texture for light exfoliation because I was otherwise underwhelmed. But I love the way it looks, feels and smells and is a good cleanser for someone who is really prone to breakouts!
customer_reviews.author: NaughtiLiterati

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and thorough facial cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super gentle, lightly fragranced, cleanser that I absolutely love. I tend to use keratin treatments quite often in my hair which forces me to use sulfate free shampoos. I love that this facial cleanser is also sulfate free which allows me to use it in the shower as well as at my sink without fear of getting something into my hair which will ruin my treatment. On top of it, this is a very reasonably priced product as well, which thoroughly cleans and removes my makeup. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive, acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes this cleanser. She has sensitive skin which is acne prone, and all too often suffers skin irritation while trying to eradicate blemishes. This cleanser is not drying, yet it does a good job getting her makeup off. She likes the light rose scent too. It's not tested on animals, either, which is a big plus for my teen. One note: the milky texture works very well, but if you prefer a gel formula that rinses extremely easily this might not be your favorite cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: SandyCB

customer_reviews.title: Hate this face wash.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely HATE this face wash and regret asking for it (Christmas). It smells decent, but does NOT leave my face feeling clean. Instead, my face feels like there's an oily film left on it. In addition, I have started breaking out. I'm 37 and until switching to Honest products (face wash, serum and moisturizer) I had flawless skin. I like that honest products are "clean," but unfortunately, this face wash will be going in the trash. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t clean well and oily residue
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this from Honest and really wanted to like it. Didn’t wash my makeup off and left an oily residue on my skin. Each time I have tried it I have broken out. Decided to use it to wash my makeup brushes.... it won’t even remove my makeup even after letting it soak for a while. Ended up throwing out. I’ll stick with their other cleaner that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on sensitive skin but not tough enough on makeup
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the gel-to-milk cleanser but it does not effectively remove my makeup. I only wear a BB cream and after I wash with this cleanser, I still need to use Cerave micellar water on a cotton pad to properly remove all traces of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tobin

customer_reviews.title: smells nice, does not make foam
customer_reviews.text: The face cleanser smells nice and gentle. It is a non-foaming kind, you apply it on your face and wash it off. I am not sure I like it all that much since it clearly leaves some kind of lotion-like residue. I do not like the feeling of it. But it does not irritate or dry my skin, so this is a plus for sure.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product not only smells great, but actually works! It removes makeup well, but is also hydrating. The gel to milk cleanser is a hydrid that I’m loving so far!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. It makes my face feel very clean without being harsh. It applies very well and comes off easily while doing a great job.
customer_reviews.author: ReconScout

customer_reviews.title: No suds
customer_reviews.text: This is a creamy cleanser, meaning no suds! Pretty mild and a nice clean smell. It doesn't seem to dry out my skin, which is a nice bonus as a lot of products I have tried, do. It does take getting use to, not having any lather.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Alan

customer_reviews.title: Negative Results
customer_reviews.text: When my wife used Honest Beauty to clean her face, it felt thick and greasy and caused her face to itch. The itch lasted two to five minutes after she rinsed it off. All in all her experience with this product was quite negative.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J. J. Kregarman

customer_reviews.title: Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser works really good. It is a great product. I am satisfied, I have no complaints. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

product_meta.title: Honest Beauty Magic Gel-to-Milk Cleanser with Pink Kaolin Clay & Rose Water | Makeup Removing Cleanser | Sulfate Free, Paraben Free | 4.0 fl. oz.
product_meta.description: There's beauty in transformation. Made with pink kaolin clay and delicately scented with rose water, our daily cleanser easily removes makeup and impurities without over-drying to leave skin glowing and clean. Upon contact with water, the translucent gel transforms to a soft, milk-like cleanser for results you can see and feel.
feature_bullets: Daily cleanser easily removes makeup and impurities without over-drying
Upon contact with water, translucent gel transforms to a soft, milk-like cleanser
Made with pink kaolin clay and delicately scented with rose water
MADE WITHOUT: SLS/SLES, Parabens, Phthalates, PEGs, Synthetic Fragrances, Dyes
